titles.title: Directing the Secretary of the Senate to make corrections in the enrollment of S. 1587.

action.text: Mr. Conyers asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote. (consideration: 9/22/1994 CR S13315)

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/20/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Senate to make corrections in the enrollment of S. 1587 (Federal Acquisition Streamlining Act of 1994).
